name: DYNAMO
description: Typically equipped with an Intel Core i3 processor, 8GB of RAM, and integrated graphics, suitable for basic computing tasks.
details: Ideal for everyday computing tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and media consumption. Limited upgrade potential due to standard motherboard and power supply unit. Best suited for users who need a reliable and affordable machine for light to moderate usage. Comes with a 1-year limited warranty and lifetime technical support via online chat and phone.

name: MARVEL
description: Offers an AMD Ryzen 5, 8GB of RAM, and a dedicated Nvidia GTX 1650 graphics card for entry-level gaming.
details: Great for entry-level gaming, capable of running most games at medium settings. Potential for RAM and storage upgrades, though limited by the standard case. Perfect for gamers on a budget or those new to PC gaming. It supports modern gaming titles and multimedia tasks with ease. Comes with a 1-year limited warranty and lifetime technical support via online chat and phone.

name: CHAMPION
description: Featuring options like Intel Core i3, 8GB RAM, and integrated graphics, suitable for home and office use.
details: Perfect for home and office tasks, such as email, spreadsheets, and web browsing. Basic expandability for additional storage or RAM. An excellent choice for students and professionals who need a dependable and affordable machine for daily tasks. Comes with a 1-year limited warranty and lifetime technical support via online chat and phone.

name: DOMINATOR
description: Configurations include high-end Intel Core i9 processors, 16GB or more RAM, and powerful Nvidia RTX 3080 graphics card, ideal for gaming and VR.
details: Designed for high-end gaming, virtual reality, and intensive multimedia tasks. Ample room for future upgrades with high wattage PSU and spacious case. Ideal for gamers and creators who demand top-tier performance. Offers a seamless experience in the latest AAA games and VR applications. Comes with a 2-year limited warranty with on-site support, along with lifetime technical support via online chat and phone.

name: TITAN
description: Compact design with AMD Ryzen 7 processors, 16GB RAM, and high-end Nvidia RTX 3070 graphics, offering excellent gaming performance.
details: Ideal for gamers looking for high performance in a compact form factor. Good expansion options with support for additional storage and enhanced cooling solutions. Excellent choice for those with limited space but high performance needs. Handles modern gaming and streaming effortlessly. Comes with a 2-year limited warranty with on-site support, along with lifetime technical support via online chat and phone.

name: GLADIATOR
description: Featuring an AMD Ryzen 7 processors, 16GB RAM, and Nvidia RTX 3060 graphics card, designed for gamers seeking a balance between performance and price.
details: Great for gamers and power users who want a balance of performance and cost. Flexible upgrade options for future improvements in performance. Offers reliable performance in gaming and multitasking at an affordable price. Suitable for gamers who want to enjoy high settings without breaking the bank. Comes with a 2-year limited warranty with on-site support, along with lifetime technical support via online chat and phone.

name: PRODIGY
description: Configurations offer Intel Xeon processors, up to 64GB of ECC RAM, and Nvidia Quadro graphics, suitable for demanding professional tasks like CAD and 3D rendering.
details: Engineered for professionals working in CAD, 3D rendering, and other intensive applications. Highly expandable with multiple slots for RAM and additional GPUs. Delivers exceptional performance and reliability for complex projects. Suitable for architects, engineers, and designers. Comes with a 3-year limited warranty with on-site support, along with lifetime technical support via online chat and phone.

name: INNOVATOR
description: Options include Intel Xeon processors, up to 128GB of ECC RAM, and Nvidia Quadro RTX graphics, ideal for professionals in industries like architecture, engineering, and design.
details: Perfect for high-demand professional applications such as architecture, engineering, and design. Extensive expandability options to support large-scale upgrades. Built for handling large datasets and complex simulations. Ideal for professionals who need maximum reliability and performance. Comes with a 3-year limited warranty with on-site support, along with lifetime technical support via online chat and phone.

name: POWERHOUSE
description: Featuring Intel Xeon processors, up to 128GB of RAM, and Nvidia Quadro graphics, designed for heavy-duty computing tasks such as video editing, animation, and scientific simulations.
details: Ideal for professionals requiring robust computing power for video editing, animation, and scientific simulations. Maximum expandability for handling the most demanding tasks and future upgrades. Provides unparalleled performance and reliability for critical applications. Suitable for film editors, animators, and researchers. Comes with a 3-year limited warranty with on-site support, along with lifetime technical support via online chat and phone.
